name: SynthWaves
description:
Thrust into the middle of a war spanning multiple worlds, you have been selected. Take control of a battlefield in a retrowave world, using an arsenal of sentries and the guidance of a mysterious company to fight off waves of invading synths who aim to conquer everything.

Push Through the Synth Invasion


Fight your way through 4 different locations and a simulation to put a stop to the Synth's reign of terror, and perhaps evaluate the motives of your secretive allies.

Manage the Battlefield


Utilize an arsenal of 20 sentries to plan your defense and ensure the annihilation of the Synth's forces

Take in the Sights


From massive, floating pyramids to tropical forests and massive industrial cities, take in the sights inspired by art of the 80's and visions of the future to the beat of thumping synthwave tracks.

Save the Worlds


Push the heart of the Synth's homeland and discover how they fuel their armies and put a stop to it.
